validate.pass.lowercase: Password must contain at least 1 lowercase letter
validate.pass.uppercase: Password must contain at least 1 uppercase letter
validate.pass.digit: Password must contain at least 1 digit
validate.pass.length: Password must be between 6 and 14 characters long, consist of Latin letters and numbers
validate.passConfirm.compare: Password and confirmation do not match
validate.name: May consist of Latin and Cyrillic letters, space and dash
app.auth.Action.Title: { title }
